title: Change button click to refresh page
diff_active: diff --git a/frontend/src/Navigation.js b/frontend/src/Navigation.js index fc335cd..b697904 100644 --- a/frontend/src/Navigation.js +++ b/frontend/src/Navigation.js @@ -4,4 +4,18 @@ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const LogoButton = () => ( - @@ -75,3 +89,7 @@ const MagicWandButton = ({ setPca, isWandActive }) => ( > - + @@ -93,4 +111,11 @@ const Navigation = ({ searchTerms, setSearchTerms, isLoading, setPca }) => ( - - 2} /> + + 2} + />
message_prompt: I want the logo button to refresh the page on click.
message_edit:
I will modify the `LogoButton` component in `frontend/src/Navigation.js` to refresh the page when clicked.

Steps:
1. Update the `onClick` handler of the `LogoButton` to use `window.location.reload()`.
